data.sentence: The word فَمَا comes from the root م ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: Something or someone that remains, continues, lasts and/or enduresPerpetual or permanentExisting, incessantly, always, endlessly or foreverWatching, observing, guarding or preservingPardoning, leaving, showing mercy or sparingRemaining portion, remainder, remnant, relic, residue, remains, recompense
data.sentence: The word أَبْقَى comes from the root ب ق ي and is associated with the meanings: Something or someone that remains, continues, lasts and/or enduresPerpetual or permanentExisting, incessantly, always, endlessly or foreverWatching, observing, guarding or preservingPardoning, leaving, showing mercy or sparingRemaining portion, remainder, remnant, relic, residue, remains, recompense
